comment.caption: Martha Ellen Truman watches a herd of sheep grazing in front of the Truman farmhouse
comment.note: A herd of sheep grazing in front of the Truman farmhouse while Martha Ellen Truman, mother of Harry s. Truman, watches from the porch. The arbor is visible to the side. From: Copied from photos lent to the Truman Library by Martha Ann Swoyer, a daughter of Vivian Truman.
